Summary: I have seen 5 objects in the past 8 months (2011) walking my dog at night along the edge of the everglades.
divs: sighting detailsthese objects appeared high in the sky looking similar to stars only they moved.one appeared out of nowhere while standing in my driveway,it was the size of the largest star in the sky,then it very quickly moved away and up until it was out of sight.another time an orange\red light again the size of the largest star in the sky caught my eye as i watched it move up and slightly to the side until it was out of sight.all of the others appeared high in the sky looking like stars with absoloutly no blinkng lights.there movement ranged from stationary to accellerating to sudden change in direction.some would cover a huge area up in the sky in a matter of seconds.i do not believe comets,meteors or any other natural objects change speed or direction.these all appeared on very clear nights while seeing planes and shooting stars off and on.i have notd been able to stop thinking about these thins i have seen,are they ours or someone elses,i will always have my eyes on the sky both day and night. ron
